trans-unit.source: Represents widths in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa a largura em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" />.

trans-unit.source: The absolute pixel value to initialize the length to.
trans-unit.target: O valor absoluto de pixel para o qual inicializar o comprimento.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> structure with an absolute value in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> com um valor absoluto em pixels.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pixels" /> is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pixels" /> é <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.

trans-unit.source: The requested size of the element.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho solicitado do elemento.

trans-unit.source: The type that is used to determine how the size of the element is calculated.
trans-unit.target: O tipo usado para determinar como o tamanho do elemento é calculado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> structure with the specified value and length unit.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> com o valor e a unidade de comprimento especificados.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> é <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Star" /> and <paramref name="value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" /> or <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Star" /> e <paramref name="value" /> é <see cref="F:System.Double.NegativeInfinity" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Double.PositiveInfinity" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is not <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Auto" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Pixel" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Star" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Item" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> não é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Auto" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Pixel" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Star" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Item" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> structure that represents the standard automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> que representa o modo de dimensionamento automático padrão.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> structure that represents the standard automatic sizing mode.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> estrutura que representa o modo de dimensionamento automático padrão.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um objeto é igual ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado com a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o objeto especificado é igual ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> with the same value and sizing mode as the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o objeto especificado for um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> com o mesmo valor e o modo de dimensionamento que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> to compare to the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> a ser comparado com a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> especificado é igual ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified object is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> with the same value and sizing mode as the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o objeto especificado for um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> com o mesmo valor e o modo de dimensionamento que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o código hash para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" />.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance sizes elements based on a fixed pixel or logical value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se estes elementos de tamanhos de instância baseiam-se em um valor lógico ou de pixel fixo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength.RibbonControlLengthUnitType" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Pixel" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Item" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength.RibbonControlLengthUnitType" /> está definida como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Pixel" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Item" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance automatically sizes elements.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta instância dimensiona elementos automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength.RibbonControlLengthUnitType" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Auto" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength.RibbonControlLengthUnitType" /> estiver definida como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Auto" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance automatically sizes elements based on a weighted proportion of available space.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esta instância dimensiona automaticamente os elementos com base em uma proporção ponderada de espaço disponível.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength.RibbonControlLengthUnitType" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Star" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength.RibbonControlLengthUnitType" /> estiver definida como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Star" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> structures for equality.
trans-unit.target: Compara a igualdade de duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> instances have the same value and sizing mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> tiverem o mesmo valor e modo de dimensionamento; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> instance to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> structures to determine whether they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Compara duas estruturas <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> para determinar se elas não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> instances do not have the same value or sizing mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se as duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> não tiverem o mesmo valor ou modo de dimensionamento; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type that is used to determine how the size of the element is calculated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo que é usado para determinar como o tamanho do elemento é calculado.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies how the size of the element is calculated.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração que especifica como o tamanho do elemento é calculado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: A string that represent the current object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the absolute value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> in pixels or logical units.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor absoluto de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> em pixels ou em unidades lógicas.

trans-unit.source: The absolute value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> in pixels or logical units, or 1.0 if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength.RibbonControlLengthUnitType" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor absoluto do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength" /> em pixels, unidades lógicas ou 1.0 se o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLength.RibbonControlLengthUnitType" /> está definida como <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlLengthUnitType.Auto" />.
